name: src/Item.js
src/index.js
src/integerValuesKnapsack.js
integerValuesKnapsack
description:
Exact DP solution to the 0-1 knapsack problem with integer values given a known
upper bound V on OPT. Runs in O(nV) time.

name: src/integerValuesKnapsackUnbounded.js
integerValuesKnapsackUnbounded
description:
Exact DP solution to the unbounded knapsack problem with integer values
given a known upper bound V on OPT. Runs in O(nV) time.

name: src/integerWeightsKnapsack.js
integerWeightsKnapsack
description:
Exact DP solution to the 0-1 knapsack problem with integer weights.
Runs in O(nW) time.

name: src/integerWeightsKnapsackUnbounded.js
integerWeightsKnapsackUnbounded
description:
Exact DP solution to the unbounded knapsack problem with integer weights.
Runs in O(nW) time.

name: src/knapsackApprox.js
knapsackApprox
description: (1-eps)-approx for the knapsack problem. Runs in O(N^3/eps) time.

name: src/knapsackGreedy.js
knapsackGreedy
description:
1/2-approximation to the 0-1 knapsack problem.
Runs in O(n log n) time.

Let OPT' be the value of the LP relaxation.
Let v_i be the values of the items ordered by utility.
Let k be the largest k such that sum(v[:k]) <= W.
Let t = (W-sum(w[:k])) / w_{k+1},
we have t < 1 and OPT' = sum(v[:k]) + t * v_{k+1}.
Hence sum(v[:k+1]) > OPT' >= OPT.
By partition one of { sum(v[:k]) , v_{k+1} } is at least OPT / 2.
Assuming w_i <= W for all i in [N] each of these is feasible.

name: src/knapsackUnboundedGreedy.js
knapsackUnboundedGreedy
description:
1/2-approximation to the unbounded knapsack problem.
Runs in O(n log n) time.

name: src/orderedByDecreasingUtility.js

content:
:school_satchel: [@aureooms/js-knapsack](https://aureooms.github.io/js-knapsack)
==

Knapsack problem algorithms for JavaScript.
See [docs](https://aureooms.github.io/js-knapsack/index.html).

> :building_construction: Caveat emptor! This is work in progress. Code may be
> working. Documentation may be present. Coherence may be. Maybe.

> :warning: The code requires `regeneratorRuntime` to be defined, for instance by importing
> [regenerator-runtime/runtime](https://www.npmjs.com/package/regenerator-runtime).

name: ./README.md
package.json
./doc/manual/installation.md
content:
# Installation

Can be managed using
[yarn](https://yarnpkg.com/en/docs),
[npm](https://docs.npmjs.com),
or [jspm](https://jspm.org/docs).


### yarn
```terminal
yarn add @aureooms/js-knapsack
```

### npm
```terminal
npm install @aureooms/js-knapsack --save
```

### jspm
```terminal
jspm install npm:@aureooms/js-knapsack
```
